name: HEG Ship
description:
Don't let any coming jets pass!

Controls:  WASD  or ARROWS to move  |  SPACEBAR to Shoot

A Space Shooter game. First releasable game made by me.

This project has been made within an Udemy course named  "The Ultimate Guide to Game Development with Unity 2019". All the sprites and VFX are provided by the course but scripts are totally mine and behavior of the game is not same as final result of the course. Some solutions to problems I faced, differ from the course solutions entirely.

The game is at a fully playable state right now but maybe someday I come back and change some functionalities and even add some features.

Thank you for playing my game!  :)
